news.title: Get Nimble with Troegs
news.excerpt: We've partnered with Troegs Independent Brewing to celebrate the launch of Nimble Giant with a new badge! Tap here to find out all the details!

news.title: Core Badge Update - June 2016
news.excerpt: Who's ready for some brand new core badges? We've got 6 of them ready for you to start earning today. Don't forget you can help vote for the next batch. Get all the details on our blog!

news.title: Taste Bay Crafted
news.excerpt: Have you tried a taste of Bay Crafted? Check out some Tampa breweries to earn a badge! In Florida already? Two (2) VIP tickets to the 2016 Halfway There: A Rare Beer Festival - which includes a Halfway There T-shirt, glassware, early admission, and unlimited beers during the event. Tap here for more info!
